Uses of Class
net.cloud.client.event.shutdown.ShutdownException

  • Packages that use ShutdownException 
    Package Description
    net.cloud.client.event.shutdown  
    net.cloud.client.event.shutdown.hooks  

    • Uses of ShutdownException in net.cloud.client.event.shutdown

      Methods in net.cloud.client.event.shutdown that throw ShutdownException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void ShutdownHandler.executeHooks(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Actually goes through and executes each ShutdownHook.
      void ShutdownHook.shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Called to tell this object that it's time to shut down the service it represents.
      void ShutdownHandler.shutdownAll(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Run the shutdown procedure for all of the hooks in this handler.
      void ShutdownHandler.waitForShutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Useful for making sure the thread that created the handler is the one that executes the hooks within it.

    • Uses of ShutdownException in net.cloud.client.event.shutdown.hooks

      Methods in net.cloud.client.event.shutdown.hooks that throw ShutdownException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TaskEngineShutdownHook.shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Stop the task service.
      void NettyShutdownHook.shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Attempt to stop the Netty Client.
      void LoggerShutdownHook.shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Stop the LoggerService.
      void GraphicShutdownHook.shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Tell the graphics attached to this hook to stop redrawing itself.
      void FileServerShutdownHook.shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Tell the file server it's time to stop.
